room_title: Escape room "Phase III: Human Trials" by Austin Panic Room in Austin
room_description:
If you’ve never been scared of going to the doctor, that’s about to change. As kidnapped subjects of a mad surgeon, you have been injected with a lethal drug… the chances of survival are looking extremely slim. With the help of a secret ally, can you find a cure and escape before the doctor returns to finish the job?
Due to low ceilings, this room is best for participants 6’2″ (74 inches or 189cm) or shorter. This room contains flashing lights in a small part of the game. Those with histories of seizures or epilepsy may opt out or have the flashing light turned off during the game.
